{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Iris Smart Hub (IH200) |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Iris |model = Smart Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = IH200B |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = ZigBee |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = smart home hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = T3L-SS009 |icid = 12192A-SS009 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1159402 REV B |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM3352;AM3352BZCZ100; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 4.4 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC2GMDEA-0M WT A; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN8710A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:16:A2 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.07;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.26;Yocto;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (19200 8N1),, J1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, ZigBee, Z-Wave, battery backup, buzzer |addchip = Z-Wave Wireless Modem;Sigma Designs;XM5304;;1;,,, 500mA Low Noise Voltage Regulator;TI;TL5209;;1;,,, 500mA Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TSP2051B;;2;,,, 40V 40A P-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AOD4189;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1; |802dot11_protocols =ZigBee, Bluetooth
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = zm{[*f6gB5X($]R9 or kz58!~Eb.RZ?+bqb |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CentraLite Systems, Inc |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/18/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 812489023131 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Mexico
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Silicon Labs;EM3587; |rad1chip2 = Skyworks;SE2439T; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = ZigBee
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Texas Instruments;CC2541; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2stand = Bluetooth
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' AM3358 BZCZ100 :@1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :NEON floating-point accelerator :2x PRU 32-bit microcontrollers *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 2GB eMMC 4.4 *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port :ZigBee Silicon Labs EM3587 :Bluetooth 4.0 ''[[TI]]'' CC2541 :Z-Wave Sigma Designs XM5304 *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host *Power Source: 5V 2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/arcus-smart-home/arcushubos ''OS Source'' on '''GitHub''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
